text: Apple didn’t wait around for tariff certainty from the Trump administration to get ahead of the potential hit. title: UK gas producer Energean terminates Carlyle deal over approval delays
text: (Reuters) -UK-based gas producer Energean said on Friday it was terminating a deal with private equity fund Carlyle for the sale of some of its assets due to delays in obtaining regulatory approvals in Italy and Egypt.  The two companies struck a $945 million deal in June last year that would allow Carlyle to establish a new Mediterranean-focused oil and gas company, led by former BP CEO Tony Hayward, and utilise Energean's assets in Egypt, Italy, and Croatia.

ConocoPhillips and Moelis declined to comment.
